casebody.data:
S.T., Respondent,
v.
B.K.V., Appellant. No. ED 106280 Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District, DIVISION ONE. Filed: November 6, 2018 FOR APPELLANT: Steven A. Waterkotte, 7750 Clayton Rd., Ste. 290, St. Louis, MO 63117. S.T., Respondent Acting Pro Se. Before Roy L. Richter, P.J., Robert M. Clayton III, J., and Angela T. Quigless, J.

ORDER

PER CURIAM.

B.K.V. ("Appellant") appeals the judgment of the trial court granting S.T. a full order of protection against Appellant.

No jurisprudential purpose would be served by a written opinion. We have, however, provided the parties a memorandum setting forth the reasons for our decision. The judgment of the trial court is affirmed under Rule 84.16(b).
